item.description:
Venus is a great restaurant in Easthampton. We will be in the Cellar Bar and the cost of the three course dinner will be $30.00 per person, including tax and tip. [We each pay for our own beverages separately]

Register now, as there are only 26 places and we booked up quickly last month, or I will be sending a more detailed description of the restaurant in the next day or so. There is a $5.00 per person to register for the event and you are welcome to invite guests.

I look forward to seeing you in a few weeks!

Happy Thanksgiving,

Jessica

to manually register, just go to [url=http://www.meetup.com/Western-Mass-Eat-Up/calendar[/url]
item.name: It's on for Venus-Tuesday, Dec. 15th at 6:30pm
